name: Suburban Propane Partners, L.P.
description: Suburban Propane Partners, L.P. is a leading provider of propane distribution and related services in the United States. Established in 1996, the company has built a strong reputation for delivering reliable energy solutions to residential, commercial, and industrial customers. Suburban Propane offers a range of services including propane sales, tank installation, and maintenance, as well as heating oil and related products. The company's operations are supported by a vast network of distribution facilities and a dedicated workforce, ensuring that customers receive prompt and efficient service. With a commitment to safety and environmental responsibility, Suburban Propane adheres to stringent industry standards and invests in modernizing its infrastructure. The company also emphasizes customer satisfaction, offering flexible payment options and personalized service plans to meet individual needs. As the energy landscape evolves, Suburban Propane continues to innovate and explore new opportunities in renewable energy and sustainable practices, aiming to serve its customers while contributing to a greener future.

seo.meta_title: Suburban Propane Partners, L.P. | Propane Distribution Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Suburban Propane Partners, L.P., a leading provider of propane services in the U.S. Explore our commitment to safety, customer service, and sustainable energy solutions.

faq.question: What services does Suburban Propane offer?
faq.answer: Suburban Propane offers propane distribution, tank installation, heating oil delivery, and related services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Suburban Propane?
faq.answer: Michael Stivala is the CEO of Suburban Propane Partners, L.P.

faq.question: Where is Suburban Propane headquartered?
faq.answer: Suburban Propane is headquartered in Whippany, New Jersey, USA.
